verses.verse: Hold not your peace <S%H2790><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%> of my praise <S%H8416><s%>;

For the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> and the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the deceitful <S%H4820><s%> are opened <S%H6605><s%> against me <S%H1696><s%>: they have spoken against me with a lying <S%H8267><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%>.
They surrounded <S%H5437><s%> me about also with words <S%H1697><s%> of hatred <S%H8135><s%>; and fought <S%H3898><s%> against me without a cause <S%H2600><s%>.
For my love <S%H160><s%> they are my adversaries <S%H7853><s%>: but I give myself unto prayer <S%H8605><s%>.
And they have rewarded <S%H7760><s%> me evil <S%H7451><s%> for good <S%H2896><s%>, and hatred <S%H8135><s%> for my love <S%H160><s%>.
Set <S%H6485><s%> you a wicked man <S%H7563><s%> over him <S%H7854><s%>: and let Satan stand <S%H5975><s%> at his right hand <S%H3225><s%>.
When he shall be judged <S%H8199><s%>, let him be <S%H3318><s%> condemned <S%H7563><s%>: and let his prayer <S%H8605><s%> become sin <S%H2401><s%>.
Let his days <S%H3117><s%> be few <S%H4592><s%>; and let another <S%H312><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> his office <S%H6486><s%>.
Let his sons <S%H1121><s%> be fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and his wife <S%H802><s%> a widow <S%H490><s%>.
Let his sons <S%H1121><s%> be continually <S%H5128><s%> vagabonds <S%H5128><s%>, and beg <S%H7592><s%>: let them seek <S%H1875><s%> their bread also out of their desolate places <S%H2723><s%>.
Let the extortioner <S%H5383><s%> catch <S%H5367><s%> all that he has <S%H2114><s%>; and let the strangers plunder <S%H962><s%> his labor <S%H3018><s%>.
Let there be none to extend <S%H4900><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> unto him <S%H2603><s%>: neither let there be any to favor his fatherless sons <S%H3490><s%>.
Let his posterity <S%H319><s%> be cut off <S%H3772><s%>; and in the generation <S%H1755><s%> following <S%H312><s%> let their name <S%H8034><s%> be blotted out <S%H4229><s%>.

Let the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of his fathers <S%H1><s%> be remembered <S%H2142><s%> with the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; and let not the sin <S%H2403><s%> of his mother <S%H517><s%> be blotted out <S%H4229><s%>.
Let them be before the Lord <S%H3068><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>, that he may cut off <S%H3772><s%> the memory <S%H2143><s%> of them from the earth <S%H776><s%>.

Because that he remembered <S%H2142><s%> not to show <S%H6213><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%>, but persecuted <S%H7291><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, that he might even kill <S%H4191><s%> the broken <S%H3512><s%> in heart <S%H3824><s%>.
As he loved <S%H157><s%> cursing <S%H7045><s%>, so let it come <S%H935><s%> unto him <S%H2654><s%>: as he delighted not in blessing <S%H1293><s%>, so let it be far from him <S%H7368><s%>.

As he clothed <S%H3847><s%> himself with cursing <S%H7045><s%> like as with his garment <S%H4055><s%>, so let it come <S%H935><s%> into his bowels <S%H7130><s%> like water <S%H4325><s%>, and like oil <S%H8081><s%> into his bones <S%H6106><s%>.
Let it be unto him as the garment <S%H899><s%> which covers <S%H5844><s%> him <S%H4206><s%>, and for a belt with which he is girded <S%H2296><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>.
Let this be the reward <S%H6468><s%> of my adversaries <S%H7853><s%> from the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and of them that speak <S%H1696><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> against my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
But do <S%H6213><s%> you for me <S%H3069><s%>, O God the Lord <S%H136><s%>, for your name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake <S%H2617><s%>: because your mercy is good <S%H2896><s%>, deliver you me <S%H5337><s%>.
For I am poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%>, and my heart <S%H3820><s%> is wounded <S%H2490><s%> inside me <S%H7130><s%>.
I am gone <S%H1980><s%> like the shadow <S%H6738><s%> when it declines <S%H5186><s%>: I am tossed up and down <S%H5287><s%> as the locust <S%H697><s%>.
My knees <S%H1290><s%> are weak <S%H3782><s%> through fasting <S%H6685><s%>; and my flesh <S%H1320><s%> fails <S%H3584><s%> of fatness <S%H8081><s%>.
I became also a reproach <S%H2781><s%> unto them <S%H7200><s%>: when they looked upon me they shaked <S%H5128><s%> their heads <S%H7218><s%>.
Help <S%H5826><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord my God <S%H430><s%>: O save <S%H3467><s%> me according to your mercy <S%H2617><s%>:
That they may know <S%H3045><s%> that this is your hand <S%H3027><s%>; that you <S%H3068><s%>, Lord, have done it <S%H6213><s%>.
Let them curse <S%H7043><s%>, but bless <S%H1288><s%> you <S%H6965><s%>: when they arise, let them be ashamed <S%H954><s%>; but let your servant <S%H5650><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%>.
Let my adversaries <S%H7853><s%> be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with shame <S%H3639><s%>, and let them cover <S%H5844><s%> themselves with their own confusion <S%H1322><s%>, as with a mantle <S%H4598><s%>.
I will greatly <S%H3966><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> with my mouth <S%H6310><s%>; Yes <S%H1984><s%>, I will praise him among <S%H8432><s%> the multitude <S%H7227><s%>.
For he shall stand <S%H5975><s%> at the right hand <S%H3225><s%> of the poor <S%H34><s%>, to save <S%H3467><s%> him from those that condemn <S%H8199><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%>.
